Description:
Job description:We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Civil Structural Engineer to join our team. As a Civil Structural Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, analyzing, and overseeing various structural elements of construction projects. Your expertise will play a pivotal role in ensuring the safety, stability, and efficiency of buildings, bridges, infrastructure, and other structures.Job Responsibilities:Performs structural design and analysis calculations using governing codes and standards, engineering formulas, skills, and experience.
Provide drawing for own designs and produce sketches to incorporate in drawings by Designers/Drafters.
Use computer-assisted engineering and design software and equipment to prepare engineering design documents.
Assume the lead engineer's role on assigned projects as well as responsible for perform field and supervision activities such as observe and record existing field conditions, take and verify measurements with project area.
Review shop drawings
Attend and participate in Client meetings.
Coordinate work with other disciples such as architectural, mechanical, rtcSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in civil engineering or a related field.
Strong knowledge of structural analysis software and design tools, as well as proficiency in AutoCAD and other relevant software.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address complex structural challenges.
Detail-oriented with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet project deadlines.
H R(AT)A L B A N N A-E N G(DOT)COM
Dubai: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)
